title: Supreme Court Confronts Systemic Emoluments Violations
summary: In a landmark hearing, the Supreme Court began addressing complex constitutional challenges surrounding executive branch financial entanglements. The court explored unprecedented legal territory regarding potential emoluments violations, signaling a willingness to directly examine potential conflicts of interest at the highest levels of government. This hearing represents a critical moment in constitutional accountability, probing the boundaries of presidential financial independence and potential foreign influence.

sources.outlet: Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington (CREW)
sources.title: The Intensifying Threat of Donald Trump's Emoluments
